- collectRewards(bytes calldata looksRareClaim) external: Fetches users' LooksRare rewards from the Universal Router and sends them to an external rewards distributor contract, using the provided `looksRareClaim` data. From input_codes/interfaces/IRewardsCollector.sol
- collectRewards(bytes calldata looksRareClaim) external: Collects rewards from the LooksRare rewards distributor, and then transfers the collected tokens to the router rewards distributor. Emits a RewardsSent event with the transferred amount. From input_codes/RewardsCollector.sol
- safeTransfer(ERC20 token, address to, uint256 amount): Transfers the specified `amount` of tokens to the `to` address for the given ERC20 `token`, safely ensuring no failures or errors occur. From input_codes/solmate/src/utils/SafeTransferLib.sol
